[h1]Removing Attributes[/h1]

You can also remove attributes from HTML elements.
The [b]removeAttr()[/b] method is used for removing any attribute of an element.
In the example below we remove the [b]border [/b]and [b]class [/b]attributes of the table: [code format="js" codeId="1111"]$("table").removeAttr("border");
$("table").removeAttr("class"); [/code]
